title.native: アズールレーンびそくぜんしんっ！

description:
This is a slightly peculiar world where the shipgirls live in. A lively and enjoyable school life for girls from different factions will begin at the naval port of Azur Lane. Living out their lives to the fullest, these girls get into various shenanigans—slowly but surely!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Ships
tags.description: Prominently features the use of sea-based transportation vessels.

tags.name: College
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a college or university.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

title.native: アズールレーンびそくぜんしんっ！
アズールレーンびそくぜんしんっ！誇らしき母港に祝祭を
アズールレーン びそくぜんしんっ！にっ！！

name.native: アドミラル・グラーフ・シュペー

node.description:
Composer and arranger from Kyoto Prefecture, Japan. He mainly creates music for eroge.

[Website](http://shade-music-lab.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Shade0123)
Tadashi Kitaoka is a Composite Artist. He features frequently in [Seven Arcs](https://anilist.co/studio/35/Seven-Arcs) productions.
Founder and representative director of Otonarium.

__Height:__ 162cm

[Profile](http://www.starchild.co.jp/artist/sakakibara/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/sakakibara-yui/)

Visual Novel Roles:~!
Hamaji Yakumo - √after and another
Hamaji Yakumo - H2O ~Footprints in the Sand~
Haruhi Kimisaka - Happiness
Kinoshita Rumi - Pia Carrot e Youkoso!! G.O. Summer Fair
Satou Hina - Pia Carrot e Youkoso!! G.P. Gakuen Princess Portable
Umi Hayasaka - Harukoi Otome
Chaos; Head - F.E.S (Kishimoto Ayase)!~

[Website](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/masakierica/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/masakierica)

Erika Masaki is a Japanese singer and lyricist affiliated with the Lantis label.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/compose_ojisan)

__Yuuki Honda__ is a composer, arranger and guitarist.

He got married to the voice actress [Risa Tsumugi](https://anilist.co/staff/137054) on October 19, 2022.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/compose_ojisan)

__Yuuki Honda__ is a composer, arranger and guitarist.

He got married to the voice actress [Risa Tsumugi](https://anilist.co/staff/137054) on October 19, 2022.
